question:
The eyes of the mantis shrimp have more types of photoreceptors, or color-detecting cells, than those of any other animal on the planet. While one would think that this would allow the mantis shrimp to better (i) ________ colors, researchers have found this to be (ii) ________.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
A. improve
D. baseless
B. discriminate
E. obvious
C. distort
F. illiberal
